title: Design furnished studio next to place des Vosges, no agency
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


25sq.meters studio on the 2d floor of the 18th century building. Big window on the street. Design furniture, double futon bed, small kitchen, bathroom with a bath. High speed wifi internet, all the necessary in the kitchen and linen are provided. Convenient for little cooking. Wooden floor. Safe and beautiful area. 1300 euros a month. All bills included. Sublet. Available from September 22nd for 6 months minimum. May be longer to be confirmed later. Deposit 1300 euros. Please do not hesitate to contact me for forther information. Thank you
